# New line mark \n

```{r}
string1 <- "row1\nrow2"
string2 <- "col1\tcol2"
string3 <- "col12\tcol22"
print(string2)
message(string2)
cat(string3)
```

# Read weather data

```{r}

url <- "http://61.216.185.17/466920.txt"
weather <- read_csv(url, locale = locale(encoding = "Big5")) %>%
    select(5, 9)
names(weather) <- c("timestamp", "temp")
    
weather %>% 
    mutate(d = lubridate::date(timestamp)) %>%
    group_by(d) %>%
    summarize(day_temp = mean(temp)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = as.POSIXct(lubridate::as_datetime(d)), y = day_temp)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    theme_minimal()
```
